userestrict.head: Publication Rights/ Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Librarian/ Associate Curator of Rare Books and Manuscripts, and the holder of the copyright, if not the Rockefeller Library at Colonial Williamsburg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John E. Bossieux Papers, Manuscript MS 37.3, John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: John E. Bossieux was the president of the Richmond, Williamsburg and Central Turnpike Company.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Stock certificate, December 27, 1873, issued to John E. Bossieux for seventy shares in the Richmond, Williamsburg, and Central Turnpike Company signed by Bossieux as president of the company and Thomas S. Armistead as secretary; also power of attorney from Bossieux to Mann S[atterwhite] Quarles to sell seventy shares of stock in the company, witnessed by C. C. Cawthorn.

controlaccess.head: Corporate Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Richmond, Williamsburg and Central Turnpike Company.
